title: 24 July 2019 Mogadishu bombing

article:
On 24 July 2019, a female suicide bomber blew herself up inside the office of the Mayor of Mogadishu, Abdirahman Omar Osman during a security meeting. Islamist group al-Shabaab says it carried out the bombing. Seven people were killed, including Osman.

== See also ==
*22 July 2019 Mogadishu bombing
